message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,000. I'm confident this will be a great deal for you.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I think we can work out a better price. My counteroffer would be $9,500.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,250? It's a fair price that reflects the true value of this product.
Hello Alice, I've given your last offer careful consideration. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I believe we can find a price closer to my valuation. My counteroffer is $10,000.
